article_text:
Employment Group Of The Year: Morgan Lewis

Law360, New York (January 20, 2016, 7:08 PM ET) -- Morgan Lewis & Bockius LLP was involved in not one, but two unanimous victories for employers last year at the U.S. Supreme Court on the issues of health benefits and employee pay, earning the group a spot on Law360's list of Employment Groups of the Year.



In one case, known as M&G Polymers USA LLC v. Tackett, the justices vacated a decision that put M&G on the hook for some retirees' lifetime health benefits and held that when collective bargaining agreements are silent about the duration...
